subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jan Vesely had 16 points on 8-for-8 shooting, and the host Washington Wizards handed the Charlotte Bobcats their 21st straight loss, 101-73, on Monday night.
snippet: Jan Vesely had 16 points on 8-for-8 shooting, and the host Washington Wizards handed the Charlotte Bobcats their 21st straight loss, 101-73, on Monday night.
